headline.main: MARINE INTELLIGENCE.; CLEARED. ARRIVED. SAILED. MISCELLANEOUS. MARINE DISASTERS. SPOKEN. FOREIGN PORTS. BY CABLE.

docs.snippet: Capt. Cheesman, of the steam-ship General Barnes, which foundered on Wednesday, the 23d of October, arrived in this City from Savannah yesterday. His statement of the disaster is substantially as follows: At the commencement of the voyage it blew ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Capt. Cheesman, of the steam-ship General Barnes, which foundered on Wednesday, the 23d of October, arrived in this City from Savannah yesterday. His statement of the disaster is substantially as follows: At the commencement of the voyage it blew heavily from the north-east, but hauled to east at 4 P.M. on the 22d.

headline.main: WRECK OF THE GENERAL BARNES.; THE STORY OF THE DISASTER AS TOLD BY CAPT. CHEESMAN--OTHER TROUBLES AT SEA.

docs.snippet: The revenue cutter Hamilton arrived off the Battery yesterday at noon, bringing from the Delaware Breakwater the officers and crew of the wrecked Spanish man-of-war Pizarro. Upon the same vessel came Commander J.N. Montojo, of the Spanish Naval Co...
docs.lead_paragraph: The revenue cutter Hamilton arrived off the Battery yesterday at noon, bringing from the Delaware Breakwater the officers and crew of the wrecked Spanish man-of-war Pizarro. Upon the same vessel came Commander J.N. Montojo, of the Spanish Naval Commission at Washington, who had gone from there to meet the shipwrecked men at the Breakwater, and also Senor Julian A. Principe Vice-Consul of Spain at Philadelphia.

headline.main: THE WRECKED SPANISH MAN-OFWAR.; ARRIVAL OF THE OFFICERS AND CREW IN THIS CITY--ADDITIONAL PARTICULARS OF THE WRECK.

docs.snippet: Capt. Schultz and the crew of the German bark Padang, which was wrecked in August on the Key Arenas coral reef, near Sisal, arrived at Quarantine yesterday, and, by Consul-General Schumacher's orders, were conveyed to this City and cared for at J....
docs.lead_paragraph: Capt. Schultz and the crew of the German bark Padang, which was wrecked in August on the Key Arenas coral reef, near Sisal, arrived at Quarantine yesterday, and, by Consul-General Schumacher's orders, were conveyed to this City and cared for at J. Nelke's, in Rector-street.

headline.main: THE WRECK OF THE BARK PADANG.; ARRIVAL OF THE CREW AT THIS PORT HOW THE DISASTER OCCURRED.

docs.snippet: LONDON, Jan. 4. The American ship John O. Baker, Capt. Pennell, from Bremen Dec. 18, for North Amerien, has stranded between Nieuport and Lapanne. Assistance has been sent....
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 4. The American ship John O. Baker, Capt. Pennell, from Bremen Dec. 18, for North Amerien, has stranded between Nieuport and Lapanne. Assistance has been sent.

headline.main: MARINE DISASTERS.; STRANDING OF ANAMERICAN SHIP A BRITISH STEAMER ASHORE OTHER MARINE MISHAPS.
